variables.name: Tienda
variables.value: {{get(`26`; if(contains(17.shopName; "BE"); "NL"; if(contains(17.shopName; "FR"); "FR"; if(contains(17.shopName; "DE"); "DE"; if(contains(17.shopName; "IR"); "EN"; if(contains(17.shopName; "IT"); "IT"; if(contains(17.shopName; "LU"); "FR"; if(contains(17.shopName; "PT"); "PT"; if(contains(17.shopName; "ES"); "ES"; "EN")))))))))}}

variables.name: country_id
variables.value: {{if(contains(17.shopName; "BE"); 1; if(contains(17.shopName; "FR"); 2; if(contains(17.shopName; "DE"); 3; if(contains(17.shopName; "IR"); 4; if(contains(17.shopName; "IT"); 5; if(contains(17.shopName; "LU"); 6; if(contains(17.shopName; "PT"); 7; if(contains(17.shopName; "ES"); 8; 0))))))))}}

parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )
